roleset.name: force/coerce (often into military/naval service)

example.name: all args, concatenation needed for rel
example.text: 2 . He started this war in Chad by *PRO* luring immigrants from Pakistan and poor Sahelian nations to Libya with the promise of civilian work , and then press - ganging them into fighting as the Islamic Legion .
example.arg: into fightinga s the Islamic Legion
